1.0.name: wordpress/pro3x-easy-slides
1.0.description: Simple and free slider plugin for Wordpress. Use this plugin to add featured content slider to your theme. You can create slides simply by draging Pro3x Easy Slides widgets to Pro3x Easy Slides Sidebar and you can create as many slides as you like. This plugin is wrapper for jQuery Easy Slider script developed by Alen Grakalic.
